name: IGDB
summary: A co-operative MMORPG where you work with the most incredible people to provide a layer of stability to an industry that does its best break any taxonomy. You play as one of several classes (Data, Engineering, Leadership). Each with its own area of ownership, and dependancies. Alone it is impossible to add value, but by co-operating across the various classes you are able to thwart tight deadlines, aging tech stacks, and troll submissions and in the end form meaningful friendships.
